description: Data that describes a person's professional experience

skills.description: A list of skills a person posseses

projects.description: Projects that a person has worked on

certifications.description: List of certifcations held by the applicant

work_history.description: List of roles in the order that they should be displayed in the work history section

organizations.description: Various organizations / companies that are relevant to the person

personal_info.description: Basic information of the job seeker

headline.description: A short description of how the user describes their role at an organization

website.description: Website address of the person's personal webpage

skill.description: Description and ability level for skill possessed by a person

ability.description: Ability level in the skill from 1 (beginner) to 10 (master)

project.description: Description of a project that the applicant has worked on

headline.description: Short headline that identfies the project

description.decription: Long description of the project and what the applicant's role

prestige.description: Amount of prestige associated with the project from 1 (meh) to 10 (world changing)

skills.description: List of skill used in the course of the project
skills.$comment: This array must contain elements from #skills, but I don't know how to enforce via schema

organization.description: Name of the organiztion associated with the project
organization.$comment: This must match one of the organizations in the organization element, but I don't know if there is a way to enforce this constraint via a schema

organization.description: Organization or Employer that might be affiliated with a project or a person's employment history

description.description: Long description of the organization and/or the division worked for

location.description: Location of the organization or where it was interacted with

certification.description: Certification obtained from a licencing body or university degree

organization.description: Name of the organiztion associated with the project
organization.$comment: This must match one of the organizations in the organization element, but I don't know if there is a way to enforce this constraint via a schema

date.description: Date that the certification was obtained

role.description: A role is a job or contract that was carried out at an organization over a certain date

title.description: Title or short description of your responsibilities at the organization

responsibilities.description: Long descripton of the responsibilites and day to day work that was carried out as a part of the role

organization.description: Key of the organization that the role was carried out for

start_date.description: Date at which the role started

end_date.description: Date at which the role ended
